desc: Boosts Atk by 50% for first 3 turns

dictionary.lore: A bullet that applies a special glowing pigment made from an Acute Eye on its target. A Summoner is able to detect the glow even from a distance, thus it is often used among the Demon Slayers when they work in teams. The Demon Slayers are also given a basic gun to fire the bullet, but the gun does not have great range nor power, so it does not inflict any damage on its target.

name: Lovely Charm
